pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========django-kaio===========.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-kaio.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-kaio/Class based settings for Django projects that can be read from multiple sources.Documentation-------------Visit the `documentation <http://django-kaio.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>`_ for an in-depth look at **django-kaio**.
